website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3 is a capable compact camera with a high-quality LCD, rechargeable battery, and a wide-angle 4x zoom lens. It doesn't produce the sharpest images in its class, but, overall, it leads the pack in the under-$150 cameras we've tested.
cons: Smear effect appears in HD video

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Product came very quickly. Pros: Definitely just a point and shoot. Clear images Many SCN options Very simple to use Light weight Small - can fit comfy in pocket Cons: Pic quality inside not as good Small zoom Small flash But then again, it's worth it for the price and the type of camera Good buy over all if you are looking for a basic camera that's inexpensive and will give you quality products for cheap I gave it 4 Stars only because I wanted some better indoor quality, but it will serve the purpose I'm using it for
customer_reviews.author: Miss JelC

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy So Far
customer_reviews.text: I have already had a slr type digital camera which limited the places I would take the camera. I got Lumix for it's compact size, and based on the Amazon reviews it was the best bang for the buck with the features I needed. I plan to use it outdoors so I purchased the drops and spills coverage, $22 for three years can't be beat. Also purchased the recomended case and 8gb card. Very happy with the pictures and ease of transfering the pictures by usb or card. I forget I have have it on my belt it so light. For the average person it's agreat buy, alrerady recommened it to a friend and she purchased one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Lots of research to decide on this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just what I wanted. It has a feature where the screen is viewable while in bright sunlight. The pictures are better than expected. The reason for 4 stars: manual is lousy and Panasonic customer help is chaotic. Movie-making is too confusing, I can't get it to replay on screen, but I'm new to digitals and probably should blame myself. I haven't dealt with the added Loilo software, so can't say if it's useful. If you figure out the movie-making, I would highly recommend buying this camera for the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Edsel

customer_reviews.title: Does A Good Job For What It Is
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera easy, EASY to operate, and does what it says it'll do. What's not to like? I had to laugh at the reviewers who complained about graininess in low light level situations. DUH! This is photography, not magic. TURN THE FLASH ON! I just hope that I never drop it onto something hard. I've had it for a couple of days, will review again in a year or so. Update September 2017: It's still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back-up to my Nikon D-SLR, but I find myself using it more than my Nikon. It's a great size that fits in just about any pocket. It's small enough to sneak it in to places that don't allow cameras, and it takes really great pictures. I like to use the normal setting so that I can set the ISO that I want to use, and I've been able to get some very decent low light shots without the use of a flash.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Sylar

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning Camera
customer_reviews.text: We have already used this camera for Thanksgiving and Christmas parties. It takes fantastic close-up pictures of faces due to its specialized skin-tone setting. We have already used it for my son's college graduation pictures. It is very easy to download the pics to the computer and eventually automatically sending the pics to the local pharmacy store for printouts. The only disadvantage: The macro capabilities (taking close-up pictures of plants or collectibles) may not be perfect, but it could be that I haven't figured that aspect yet. Four and a half stars out of five is what I would rate this great camera for the price (about 79 bucks).
customer_reviews.author: ebbgr

customer_reviews.title: All pictures have an orange hue
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality pictures. They have the snowy effect and have an orange hue. When using flash, everyone you take a picture of appears bruised around the eye area. Weird effect. Also, when pictures are taken indoors with flash turned off, they come out too dark even if there is warm light on in the room. Photos just don't come out good.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: "EASY HANDLING CAMERA"
customer_reviews.text: I buy this camera for my sister,she loves it.Have the basic of a digital camera,easy handling,4 optical zoom,auto detection mode,its very lightweight,and the battery life is ok.The negative point of this camera is the base is made in plastic,if the manufacturers replacing this for steel we would have a solid camera,more durable.
customer_reviews.author: HAROLD

customer_reviews.title: I had two other Lumiz before this that were awesome but I think the he quality has several declined
customer_reviews.text: Photo quality was very mediocre. Camera itself was not very durable. I had two other Lumiz before this that were awesome but I think the he quality has several declined.
customer_reviews.author: CRRB

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter who is the facebook queen and she loves the capabilities, Pictures are very clear. Video capabilities were great. The camera took long videos and didnot have any trouble with over 5 minutes. Great camera for the price and functionality
customer_reviews.author: afuzzesocks

customer_reviews.title: Solid, inexpensive camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera right before I headed off to Asia. It is a good, reliable camera with a good battery life. This is exactly what I needed given that I am a novice and the photos were for personal use and to post to facebook. If you're someone who needs complicated photography features, this is probably not your camera (you will probably have to spend much more $$ though). All-in-all, this camera is sleek, easy-to-use and the quality is pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: FinancialGenie2020

customer_reviews.title: Short shutter delay
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive, pocket size camera with a short shutter delay in order to get pictures of my great-grandson. This camera does that very well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lay

customer_reviews.title: Good little camera
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for the best inexpensive digital camera we could find. This is it - it takes good shots, is easy to use, battery holds very long charge. You do need to buy a memory card for it or you'll only get about 12 pictures before it's full. Once we got the card, it's great and takes many, many pictures. Works best in good light and outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this camera worked super-pictures were always great and unit hooked to my pc quickly and battery charges fast.
customer_reviews.author: chief

customer_reviews.title: New Point & Shoot
customer_reviews.text: For a point and shoot, this is a great cam a. I bought it for a trip to Guatemala and it worked great. I took about 300 pictures, the battery never failed, the camera always worked as it should and the pictures turned out great. For the money, it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3
customer_reviews.text: For a modest price, this is a good snapshot camera. It's simple to operate, and small enough that I take it with me more often than larger cameras. I like that it retains setting from one picture session to the next (I prefer the flash turned off as a default.) After experimenting a bit with modes, I'm very happy with the resulting images.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves it . uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: snakeppc

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything it says it will do. I have used it to take thousands of pictures and movies, too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: landm

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are much better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Battery needs to be charged more regularly than the Olympus which is charge by the computer. Pictures are much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Solid camera with nice functions for the price. Takes great pictures and videos and is easy to use. No crazy editing features like on high end cameras but the functionality of the unit is very nice and will perfectly satisfy 90% of normal users.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be an excellent value. Purchased this for a gift for my sister and messed around with it when she opened it. Immediately impressed with clarity of images, ease of use, and overall value.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Good budget camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for under $100. Picture quality is good. No much lag time between capturing photos. Handling is convenient. Photos will not come in low light. But get good pictures with flash.
customer_reviews.author: Sakith

customer_reviews.title: Canon A490 is better in JPEG quality
customer_reviews.text: I basically compared JPEG quality of this camera with that of Canon A490 which I bought a few months ago. Canon beats Panasonic in this aspect (5 stars vs. 4 stars). Photos taken in "Standard" color mode are not as sharp as those taken in "Vivid" mode. At ISO-100 on sunny days, photos from Canon A490 are just as superb as those from my Canon T2i. This Panasonic S3, however, is a little but noticeably behind in JPEG quality, but it is not very bad. I bought this Panasonic after I read its review on PhotographyBlog.com that gives this camera a rating of 4, a fairly high score for a $120 camera.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ma

customer_reviews.title: The picture that I took...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many Digital Cameras in my life and I must tell you it's the best invesment I have ever made...Buy it!.
customer_reviews.author: Waltersog

customer_reviews.title: Its a camera!
customer_reviews.text: You can take pictures with it! How incredibly cool is that? Only has 70meg internal space so you need to buy an SD card with it if you plan on taking video or lots of photos, but who cares, sd cards are cheap as fug and pop right in the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious: Instruction leaflets not in English!
customer_reviews.text: The camera came. Upon opening the box, I saw that the instruction leaflets (Basic Instructions, leaflet VQT3E23-3 and Installation of Software, leaflet VQC8056) were in Spanish and Portuguese. There were no mention in Amazon’s site of these leaflets were to be Spanish and Portuguese; on the other hand, the leaflets could have been in Russian, Greek, Chinese, Korean so I would have absolutely no idea what they are referring to. I sent an email to the vendor to Express Mail me these leaflets in English. Presently I do not dare to touch the camera without instructions; once the English leaflets are delivered, I will be able to operate the camera and comment if there are any further issues.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dinar

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: this camera is light but I take a pictures very professional like if this camera was from a photographer , I RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Yeifer

customer_reviews.title: User Manual
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that the User Manual is written in Spanish. I can not read Spanish therefore I am having to guess how to use the camera. What must I do in order to get a User Manual written in English?
customer_reviews.author: Melvin D. Price

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was supposed to be easy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera because it was supposed to be easy to use. I had a stoke 2 years ago and is difficult to do some things now. I odered it a few months ago and I still have not gotten it working. I put battery in earlier today and got the disk loaded and camera on for a total of 30 minites and battery dead again. I have trouble getting battery out and charged. If you are looking for a came.a that is easy to use...you may look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: ozarkgal30

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3 Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far the camera proforms pretty well. I have had it for a month or so with little or no problems. The viewer at times seems grainey and blurey, the pictures come out fine though? Not sure yet on overall satisfaction?
customer_reviews.author: R. Sandve

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera and when I received it I could not use it because ALL of the instructions in it were in a foreign language~ there was NO section in English. This is the same as not getting an instruction booklet at all! In addition, the warranty, oddly, which was in English, did not cover the camera if purchased in the United States, which is where I happen to live. Why this camera would be sent to a U.S. buyer and user is totally beyond me. With an instruction book in a foreign language, it is useless to me, so I have returned it and I am extremely disappointed about the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: thecat'smeow

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very light weight and easy to use. It's full of features to accommodate most typical shooting conditions. The panoramic assist needs a little improvement. It's still difficult to align for the next shot. The macro focus works well. I've been able to take detailed pictures of flowers and insects. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdy

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-S3 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 S3 

The 14.1-megapixel LUMIX S3 features a new design, with a distinct rounded shape that fits comfortably in the palm of the hand, to differentiate the models from the rest of the LUMIX line. With a 28mm* wide-angle 4x optical zoom lens, these LUMIX digital cameras are extremely versatile, helping consumers get superb shots both far and wide.

Venus Engine VI
The image-processing engine, Venus Engine VI, uses advanced signal processing to give you beautiful images. Multi-task signal processing is employed for all images to enable high-speed, high-performance shooting. Venus Engine VI also effectively raises the precision of various functions, such as MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) and Intelligent ISO Control. Along with its extremely high performance, Venus Engine VI reduces power consumption thanks to a number of energy efficiency improvements. 


iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode
When you don't know which mode will give you the best shooting results, or when a sudden photo opportunity pops up and you don't have time to change any settings, simply choose the iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode and let the camera do it all for you. Just choose the iA Mode, aim at your subject, and shoot. Four detection and correction functions are simultaneously activated to optimize the settings, so you get stunning photos every time.






MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) Shake Detection
The MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer)* in the DMC-S3 compensates for the blurring caused by hand-shake. Using built-in gyrosensors to detect even slight camera movement caused by handshake, the camera compensates for the shake so you get clear, sharp photos. The MEGA O.I.S. lets you shoot in dimly lit rooms or evening illumination to preserve the mood, and works for macro shots and zoom shots, which are especially susceptible to hand-shake. In short, it lets anybody take beautiful, blur-free shots with ease. 

* MEGA O.I.S. is automatically turned on in iA Mode and can be turned on or off in Normal Picture Mode or some Scene Modes.




Intelligent Scene Selector Scene Detection
When the camera is in iA Mode, the Intelligent Scene Selector automatically sets the Scene Mode to Scenery, Portrait, Macro, Night Portrait*1, Night Scenery or Sunset. The camera judges it from the various detection results such as focusing and brightness level of the circumstance*2. You are free from adjusting settings every time the scene changes when taking images with these frequently used Scene Modes to get beautiful results.

*1 In iA Mode, Night Portrait is not identified when the flash is turned off.
*2 With some subject and shooting conditions, it is just not possible to judge the best shooting details. When this happens, it is recommended that you shoot with the Scene Mode that best suits your purpose.







Intelligent ISO Control Motion Detection
The Intelligent ISO Control function* in the DMC-S3 made possible by the Venus Engine VI detects subject movement and automatically adjusts the ISO setting and shutter speed to best suit the movement and light conditions. When it detects subject motion, it automatically raises the ISO setting and increases the shutter speed to prevent motion blur. On the other hand, when the subject is still and no movement is detected, it takes beautiful natural photos with a low ISO setting. The Intelligent ISO Control gives you stunning images with ease because there is no need for complicated settings. 

* The Intelligent ISO Control function is automatically turned on in iA Mode, and can be turned on or off in Normal Picture Mode. 





Face Detection AF/AE
The Face Detection AF/AE function*1 detects faces and automatically optimizes the focus and exposure settings. It prevents the blurry faces that happen when the camera focuses on something in front of or behind the subject, and keeps faces from appearing dark when shooting indoors or against the light source. It detects up to 15 faces at a time, making it extremely convenient for group photos. Once the camera detects a face, Face Tracking follows it even when the subject moves around. Plus, the system keeps detection on if a face turns sideways to the camera.

*1 Face Detection function is automatically turned on in iA Mode and can be turned on or off in Normal Picture Mode or some Scene Modes. 





LUMIX Image Uploader
The DMC-S3 gives you a new form of communication by letting you share your photos and movies. All you have to do is checkmark the photos and movies you want to share and connect the camera or SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card to a computer. Uploading automatically starts by simply following the guidance. Facebook can be used for photos and YouTube for movies. You can join these social networking services without having to install any special software. It's easy to share photos and movies on the spot, which means that your friends don't have to wait for you to come back home to see them.

Easy Computer Connection
Select photos and movies on the camera menu.

Upload Photos and Movies
The software is launched after connecting the camera or SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card to a computer.

Share with Your Friends
You can share the URL by e-mail right after the upload!


Large, 2.7-inch, 230,000-dot LCD
The DMC-S3 large 2.7-inch LCD features high 230,000-dot resolution LCD. The big screen reflects fine details, making it easy to check the focus before shooting. It also serves as a small photo and video viewer, allowing the user and friends to enjoy viewing the still and motion images together. 


Built-in Memory 70MB
The DMC-S3's built-in memory holds up to approx. 70MB of image data.
feature_bullets: Panasonic iA mode makes it simple for anyone to take beautiful photos
LUMIX Image Uploader makes it simple to share pictures on Facebook and video on YouTube
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars59 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
